title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.11 - Plant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.11 - Plant

State Regulations

Plant means the land, buildings and processing equipment, not including trucks used to transport milk, constituting a single operating
unit for the receiving, handling or processing of milk or milk
products. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
21.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
